abstract: Nearly all aspects of modern life are in some way being changed by big data and machine learning. Netflix knows what movies people like to watch and Google knows what people want to know based on their search histories. Indeed, Google has recently begun to replace much of its existing nonâ€“machine learning technology with machine learning algorithms, and there is great optimism that these techniques can provide similar improvements across many sectors.
meta: March 2018JAMA The Journal of the American Medical Association 319(13)
